title: Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Formal Evening
title_original: Mermaid Prom Dresses 2026 Sparkly Sequin Corset Evening Formal Ball Gown for Women

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #960,367 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #7,178 in Women's Formal Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Formal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Champagne review
items.body: Very flattering! I was between a 4/6 and I went with a 4, fits my body nicely, corset in the back snatches you. Color is a bit more subtle than the picture, but looks really nice on fair skin. My only complaint is the straps are too short so they’re uncomfortable, and since they’re too short doesn’t pull the girls up like I wanted. I bet if I went with a 6 the straps would have been better but coulda been a bit big on the hips. Overall worth the price i’d say Read more
items.author: Madison Ramsey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of Compliments!
items.body: This dress fit like a glove, had just enough sparkle and it is a must buy! Very slimming. I received so many compliments. And, it had just enough movement that I could dance the night away. My friend to the right is wearing another ZPVP dress! Best dresses!! Read more
items.author: Darin Green

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sparkly Sensation
items.body: I don't usually wear fuchsia, but I needed a fuchsia dress for a Christmas Gala event. This dress was beautiful and just the right shade of fuchsia.Too bright and the sequin really added a nice element. The dress was very comfortable and easy to move in. I received many compliments and would definitely wear this dress again. Read more
items.author: Beverly Burch

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Formal Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Formal Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Gold, Blue, Burgundy, Fuchsia, Rose Gold, Black, Champagne, Navy Blue, Orange, Dusty Rose, Light Blue, Mint Green, Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
